article_title: Should you consider joining the gig (alternative work arrangements) economy?
article_text:
Paris, TN (38242)

Today

Partly cloudy early followed by scattered thunderstorms this afternoon. High 83F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: Today, our standard workday isn’t so standard anymore, and we’re talking more about “gigs” — alternative work arrangements that often depend on the latest technology and a desire or need
